headline: CrowdStrike Honors Top Customers and Partners Driving Innovation in AI-Powered Cybersecurity
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, September 19, 2025--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced the winners of its 2025 Protectors Awards and Global Partner Awards, presented during Fal.Con 2025 in Las Vegas. The awards recognize customers and partners who are advancing cybersecurity innovation and delivering exceptional protection outcomes on the AI-native CrowdStrike Falcon® platform.
